repo_description: A project to test some security improvements using Sequelize and GraphQL

schemas.name: Queries.graphql
schemas.content:
"Queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a user
  """
  user(id: String!): User
  """
  Get user credentials
  """
  login(email: String!, password: String!): AuthToken
  """
  Get a task
  """
  task(id: String!): Task
}

merged.mergedContent:
# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-sequelize-security-improvements/blob/1ab54957d5dd2cd9c5183282311b1c3fc4895a7c/src/graphql/queries/Queries.graphql:
"Queries"
type Query {
  """
  Get a user
  """
  user(id: String!): User
  """
  Get user credentials
  """
  login(email: String!, password: String!): AuthToken
  """
  Get a task
  """
  task(id: String!): Task
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-sequelize-security-improvements/blob/1ab54957d5dd2cd9c5183282311b1c3fc4895a7c/src/graphql/types/User.graphql:
"""
User: represents a user
"""
type User {
  """
  User id
  """
  id: String
  """
  User email
  """
  email: String
  """
  User password
  """
  password: String
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-sequelize-security-improvements/blob/1ab54957d5dd2cd9c5183282311b1c3fc4895a7c/src/graphql/types/AuthToken.graphql:
"""
AuthToken: represents a users authentication token
"""
type AuthToken {
  """
  Token
  """
  token: String!
  """
  User
  """
  user: User!
}

# https://github.com/caioflores/graphql-sequelize-security-improvements/blob/1ab54957d5dd2cd9c5183282311b1c3fc4895a7c/src/graphql/types/Task.graphql:
"""
Task: represents a task
"""
type Task {
  """
  Task id
  """
  id: String
  """
  Task content
  """
  content: String
}

schemas.name: Task.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
Task: represents a task
"""
type Task {
  """
  Task id
  """
  id: String
  """
  Task content
  """
  content: String
}

schemas.name: AuthToken.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
AuthToken: represents a users authentication token
"""
type AuthToken {
  """
  Token
  """
  token: String!
  """
  User
  """
  user: User!
}

schemas.name: User.graphql
schemas.content:
"""
User: represents a user
"""
type User {
  """
  User id
  """
  id: String
  """
  User email
  """
  email: String
  """
  User password
  """
  password: String
}
